title: Consumer knowledge, attitudes, and behaviour regarding food safety – A perspective from Laos
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Gyula Kasza, Tekla Izsó, Atilla Kunszabó, Dávid Szakos, István Lénárt, Emese Bozánné Békefi, Khamphouth Vongxay, József Popp, Judit Oláh, Zoltán Lakner, Widya Satya Nugraha, Lajos Bognár, Miklós Süth
